resources.string:
1.Is college open for today ?
 2.If yes then only click !
 3.Don't go back until attendance is finish.
4.If you click on this then totalCollegeDay will be plus one.
5.You must click before taking Attendance.
6.If by any reason you went to back activity and if you come again then don't click it again.

We are performing the operation in the backend on the basis of these things . Your format must be matched to the given hint. And if you call one branch more than one name then seperate by space Eg. CSE,EXE,CE,CIVIL
We are performing the operation in the backend on the basis of these things . Your format must be matched to the given hint.
We are performing the operation in the backend on the basis of these things . Your format must be matched to the given hint. SubjecName - SubCode . Eg Machine learning - 601

We are performing the operation in the backend on the basis of these things . Your format must be matched to the given hint.
1. College Name eg. BIRT 
2. Batch | Session Last 4 characters eg. 2024 
3.Branch Name eg. CSE 
4.Semester eg. 06 
5.Subject Code eg.601 
6.Your choiceable possword eg. 923*12
We are performing the operation in the backend on the basis of these things . Your format must be matched to the given hint. Semester - number Eg. Semester - 01,Semester-02
